attributes.action: Create a knighthood for Alan Bates
attributes.additional_details: Alan Bates highlighted, coordinated and managed the investigation into the Post Office scandal. He deserves an honour of immense magnitude for his work and integrity in this matter.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
